name: Click & Destroy
description:
This is a game in which you have to destroy circles by clicking on them. You have to destroy them before they get stronger together by combining. All you have to do is jump in and start playing. It was made in about 3-4 days. All of the assets were made by me. Sorry for the font, I am not that good at drawing them. 

A small red circle will pop up in the middle of the biggest circle when it becomes too big. Destroy it immediately.  There will also be a timer.

Controls:

  • Click

All the assets were made during the jam except for the font. The game was made using Python & Pygame.

You can also join my Discord Server if you have any questions:  https://discord.gg/GYRkPevG6u

The Game's GitHub: https://github.com/DevHedronYT/GameDev/tree/main/Python-GameDev/Click-%26-Destro...

Video: (Coming Soon)

Have fun playing!

If your on Windows, just download the Click-&-Destroy-Windows.zip file, then unzip it, go into the folder and run the .exe, remember to extract all the files otherwise you may get an error like,  "Failed to Execute Script Main" or something similar to the lines of this. Remember to keep the extracted files in the same folder. If it still does not work, maybe contact me if you can. You have to turn off antivirus as well or the game is deleted by the antivirus immediately for some reason.

Note: The game has some grammatical errors.
